languages.text: "В глазах Миссии все мы — инструменты, разложенные в порядке и тщании. Кто-то нужен для ремесла и обретения выгоды, кто-то — для защиты и кровопролития. А я — для решения споров и надзора. И лишь совсем немного — для кровопролития. Посему в ушах ваших не прозвучит иного голоса, кроме моего".

"In the eyes of the Mission, we are tools, carefully selected and arranged. One may be employed for their craft and acquisition of profit, another for protection and bloodshed. I am used for dispute resolution and oversight. And for bloodshed... though only on rare occasions. As such, no other voice but mine will sound in your ears."
languages.original_text: "В глазах Миссии все мы — инструменты, разложенные в порядке и тщании. Кто-то нужен для ремесла и обретения выгоды, кто-то — для защиты и кровопролития. А я — для решения споров и надзора. И лишь совсем немного — для кровопролития. Посему в ушах ваших не прозвучит иного голоса, кроме моего".

I am used for dispute resolution and oversight. And for bloodshed... though only on rare occasions. As such, no other voice but mine will sound in your ears."

I am used for dispute resolution and oversight. And for bloodshed... though only on rare occasions. As such, no other voice but mine will sound in your ears."

"In the eyes of the Mission, we are tools, carefully selected and arranged. One may be employed for their craft and acquisition of profit, another for protection and bloodshed. I am used for dispute resolution and oversight. And for bloodshed... though only on rare occasions. As such, no other voice but mine will sound in your ears."

"In the eyes of the Mission, we are tools, carefully selected and arranged. One may be employed for their craft and acquisition of profit, another for protection and bloodshed. I am used for dispute resolution and oversight. And for bloodshed... though only on rare occasions. As such, no other voice but mine will sound in your ears."

languages.text: “对组织而言，我们不过是精心挑选出来的工具罢了。一部分人负责通过精湛的技艺来谋取利润，而另一部分人则负责保护与杀戮相关的事务。我是负责解决争端、监督成员的工具，有时也会负责让人血流成河……不过，那只是极少数情况下才会发生的事情。正因如此，您只会听到我的声音。”
languages.original_text: "In the eyes of the Mission, we are tools, carefully selected and arranged. One may be employed for their craft and acquisition of profit, another for protection and bloodshed. I am used for dispute resolution and oversight. And for bloodshed... though only on rare occasions. As such, no other voice but mine will sound in your ears."

traits.locale_text: “对组织而言，我们不过是精心挑选出来的工具罢了。一部分人负责通过精湛的技艺来谋取利润，而另一部分人则负责保护与杀戮相关的事务。我是负责解决争端、监督成员的工具，有时也会负责让人血流成河……不过，那只是极少数情况下才会发生的事情。正因如此，您只会听到我的声音。”

languages.text: 「聖務団の目には、我々は慎重に選ばれ、配置された道具に映るだろう。ある者は技術を磨き、利益を得るために使われ、別の者は保護と流血のために使われる。私は紛争解決と監視のために使われる。そして時には…流血のために。めったとないことではありますがね。そのようなわけで、あなた方の耳に私以外の声が響くことはないでしょう」
languages.original_text: "In the eyes of the Mission, we are tools, carefully selected and arranged. One may be employed for their craft and acquisition of profit, another for protection and bloodshed. I am used for dispute resolution and oversight. And for bloodshed... though only on rare occasions. As such, no other voice but mine will sound in your ears."

traits.locale_text: 「聖務団の目には、我々は慎重に選ばれ、配置された道具に映るだろう。ある者は技術を磨き、利益を得るために使われ、別の者は保護と流血のために使われる。私は紛争解決と監視のために使われる。そして時には…流血のために。めったとないことではありますがね。そのようなわけで、あなた方の耳に私以外の声が響くことはないでしょう」

languages.text: «Para la Misión, no somos más que herramientas que ella misma selecciona y dispone a conveniencia. A unos nos contratan por nuestra destreza y capacidad de lucrarse, y a otros para protección y para derramar sangre. Mi cometido es la resolución de conflictos y la supervisión, así como el asesinato... pero solo en contadas ocasiones. Por eso, dadas las circunstancias, solo oirá mi voz».
languages.original_text: "In the eyes of the Mission, we are tools, carefully selected and arranged. One may be employed for their craft and acquisition of profit, another for protection and bloodshed. I am used for dispute resolution and oversight. And for bloodshed... though only on rare occasions. As such, no other voice but mine will sound in your ears."

traits.locale_text: «Para la Misión, no somos más que herramientas que ella misma selecciona y dispone a conveniencia. A unos nos contratan por nuestra destreza y capacidad de lucrarse, y a otros para protección y para derramar sangre. Mi cometido es la resolución de conflictos y la supervisión, así como el asesinato... pero solo en contadas ocasiones. Por eso, dadas las circunstancias, solo oirá mi voz».

languages.text: « Aux yeux de la Mission, nous sommes des outils, choisis et arrangés avec soin. Certains sont employés pour leurs talents et les profits qu'ils peuvent rapporter, tandis que d'autres sont chargés de protéger et faire couler le sang. Pour ma part, on m'envoie résoudre les différends et superviser. Parfois aussi pour faire couler le sang... mais plus rarement. Par conséquent, vous n'entendrez pas d'autre voix que la mienne. »
languages.original_text: "In the eyes of the Mission, we are tools, carefully selected and arranged. One may be employed for their craft and acquisition of profit, another for protection and bloodshed. I am used for dispute resolution and oversight. And for bloodshed... though only on rare occasions. As such, no other voice but mine will sound in your ears."

traits.locale_text: « Aux yeux de la Mission, nous sommes des outils, choisis et arrangés avec soin. Certains sont employés pour leurs talents et les profits qu'ils peuvent rapporter, tandis que d'autres sont chargés de protéger et faire couler le sang. Pour ma part, on m'envoie résoudre les différends et superviser. Parfois aussi pour faire couler le sang... mais plus rarement. Par conséquent, vous n'entendrez pas d'autre voix que la mienne. »

languages.text: "In den Augen der Mission sind wir Werkzeuge, sorgfältig ausgewählt und zusammengestellt. Manche werden eingesetzt aufgrund ihrer Profession und ihrem Profitstreben, andere aufgrund ihrer Fähigkeit, für Schutz und Blutvergießen zu sorgen. Meine Funktion ist es, Streitigkeiten beizulegen und alle Sachen zu beaufsichtigen. Und ich bin fürs Blutvergießen zuständig ... was allerdings nur selten passiert. Deswegen spreche ich hier im Namen aller."
languages.original_text: "In the eyes of the Mission, we are tools, carefully selected and arranged. One may be employed for their craft and acquisition of profit, another for protection and bloodshed. I am used for dispute resolution and oversight. And for bloodshed... though only on rare occasions. As such, no other voice but mine will sound in your ears."

Manche werden eingesetzt aufgrund ihrer Profession und ihrem Profitstreben, andere aufgrund ihrer Fähigkeit, für Schutz und Blutvergießen zu sorgen. Deswegen spreche ich hier im Namen aller."

languages.text: "Misyon'un gözünde bizler, dikkatle seçilen ve belli bir düzene göre konumlanan birer gereciz. Bir kişi zanaatteki ve kâr elde etmedeki başarısı nedeniyle görevlendirilirken, bir diğeri koruma ve kan dökme yetenekleri için görevlendirilir. Benim görevim uyuşmazlıkları çözmek ve gözetmenlik etmektir. Kan dökmek ve de. Çok nadir durumlarda ama yalnızca. Dolayısıyla benimki haricinde bir ses kulaklarınıza ulaşmayacak."
languages.original_text: "In the eyes of the Mission, we are tools, carefully selected and arranged. One may be employed for their craft and acquisition of profit, another for protection and bloodshed. I am used for dispute resolution and oversight. And for bloodshed... though only on rare occasions. As such, no other voice but mine will sound in your ears."
